description.p: The Nuxeo Office Online addon allows users to open and edit Office document in a Microsoft-native web interface. Files are stored in Nuxeo, so they can leverage Nuxeo Platform features like versioning and locking. They can also be viewed, edited or co-authored by users. The Office Online integration is based on the Web Application Open Platform Interface (WOPI) protocol provided by Microsoft. This functionality requires a separately licensed Microsoft Office365 account and subscription.
